mapper.select: select trim('"' from hospitalName) as hospitalName, trim('"' from hospitaladdr) as hospitalAddr, trim('"' from hospitaltel) as hospitalTel, trim('"' from hospitalsickbad) as hospitalSickbad, trim('"' from hospitallrm) as hospitalLrm, trim('"' from hospitalmedstaf) hospitalMedstaf, trim('"' from hospitallogt) hospitalLogt, trim('"' from hospitallat) hospitalLat from hospital where hospitalName like '%'||#{searchKey}||'%' or hospitalAddr like '%'||#{searchKey}||'%' or hospitalTel like '%'||#{searchKey}||'%'
